MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the ML2 postcode area of Wishaw affecting properties in Gala Crescent and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to safely complete repairs on our equipment near Templegill substation, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4:15pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:53pm on Saturday, 27 March 2021
